rex_zigzag.name: Zigzag
rex_zigzag.description: Using LOGO-like script to move or rotate sprite.

activated.name: Activated
activated.desc: Enable if you wish this to begin at the start of the layout.

start.name: Start
start.desc: Enable if you wish this to start at the start of the layout.

rotatable.name: Rotatable
rotatable.desc: Enable to rotate sprite with command.

repeat-count.name: Repeat count
repeat-count.desc: The times to execute commands repeatly. 0 is infinity.

commands.name: Commands
commands.desc: F=Move Forward, B=Move Backward, R=Turn Right, L=Turn Left, W=Wait. ex:"F 100;L 60"

max-moving-speed.name: Max moving speed
max-moving-speed.desc: Maximum moving speed, in pixel per second.

moving-acceleration.name: Moving acceleration
moving-acceleration.desc: Moving acceleration, in pixel per second per second.

moving-deceleration.name: Moving deceleration
moving-deceleration.desc: Moving deceleration, in pixel per second per second.

max-rotation-speed.name: Max rotation speed
max-rotation-speed.desc: Maximum rotation speed, in degrees per second.

rotation-acceleration.name: Rotation acceleration
rotation-acceleration.desc: Rotation acceleration, in degrees per second per second. 0 is using max speed directly.

rotation-deceleration.name: Rotation deceleration
rotation-deceleration.desc: Rotation deceleration, in degrees per second per second. 0 is ignored deceleration

initial-angle.name: Initial angle
initial-angle.desc: Initial zigzag angle for non-rotatable mode, in degrees.

comparemovspeed0.description: Compare the current moving speed of the object.

comparison0.name: Comparison
comparison0.desc: Choose the way to compare the current moving speed.

speed1.name: Speed
speed1.desc: The moving speed, in pixel per second, to compare the current speed to.

comparerotspeed1.description: Compare the current rotation speed of the object.

comparison0.name: Comparison
comparison0.desc: Choose the way to compare the current rotation speed.

speed1.name: Speed
speed1.desc: The rotation speed, in degree per second, to compare the current speed to.

setmaxmovspeed3.description: Set the object's maximum moving speed.

max_moving_speed0.name: Max moving speed
max_moving_speed0.desc: Maximum moving speed, in pixel per second.

moving_acceleration0.name: Moving acceleration
moving_acceleration0.desc: The moving acceleration setting, in pixel per second per second.

moving_deceleration0.name: Moving deceleration
moving_deceleration0.desc: The moving deceleration setting, in pixels per second per second.

setmaxrotspeed6.description: Set the object's maximum rotation speed.

max_rotation_speed0.name: Max rotation speed
max_rotation_speed0.desc: Maximum rotation speed, in degrees per second.

rotation_acceleration0.name: Rotation acceleration
rotation_acceleration0.desc: The rotation acceleration setting, in pixels per second per second.

rotation_deceleration0.name: Rotation deceleration
rotation_deceleration0.desc: The rotation deceleration setting, in pixels per second per second.

setrepeatcount9.description: Set times to execute commands repeatly. 0 is infinity.

repeat_count0.name: Repeat count
repeat_count0.desc: The times to execute commands repeatly. 0 is infinity.

addcmd11.description: Add a command into command queue.

addcmdstring12.description: Add commands string into command queue.

commansd0.name: Commansd
commansd0.desc: Commands string. F=Move Forward, B=Move Backward, R=Turn Right, L=Turn Left, W=Wait. ex:"F 100;L 60"

setmovingangle14.description: Set moving angle in degree. Also rotate sprite at rotatable mode

activated.description: The current activated state of behavior.

movspeed.description: The current moving speed, in pixel per second.

maxmovspeed.description: The maximum moving speed setting, in pixel per second.

movacc.description: The moving acceleration setting, in pixel per second per second.

movdec.description: The moving deceleration setting, in pixel per second per second.

rotspeed.description: The current rotation speed, in degrees per second.

maxrotspeed.description: The maximum rotation speed setting, in degrees per second.

rotacc.description: The acceleration setting, in degrees per second per second.

rotdec.description: The rotation deceleration setting, in degrees per second per second.

repcnt.description: The times to execute commands repeatly. 0 is infinity.

cmdindex.description: Get current command index in command queue. 0 is the first command.
